getValue
Class InstanceNPCValue

java.lang.Object
  getValue.InstanceNPCValue

public class InstanceNPCValue
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to obtain the stats of a specific instance of an npc. An instance NPC is a child of an NPC. When the instanceNPC is created, it is created with stats

Author:
Nicholas Ingalls

getReference

Returns a string containing the name of the parent NPC

Returns:

setReference

public void setReference(java.lang.String ref)
Changes parent NPC of which the instance is a child of. This method is included for completeness. It should not be used in most cases as it allows a child to have better/worse stats than if it were generated based on the parents stats. (This class does NOT regenerate the stats of the instance NPC, it simply changes who the parent it)

Parameters:
ref - A String contaning the name of the reference.
